snippet: The state on Wednesday appealed a federal judge’s ruling that overturned a law banning abortions as soon as a fetal heartbeat can be detected.
abstract: North Dakota appeals Federal District Court Judge Daniel Hovland's ruling that overturned a law banning abortions as soon as a fetal heartbeat can be detected.
lead_paragraph: The state on Wednesday appealed a federal judge’s ruling that overturned a law banning abortions as soon as a fetal heartbeat can be detected.

headline.main: North Dakota: Appeal Filed in Fetal Heartbeat Ruling
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: Appeal Filed in Fetal Heartbeat Ruling
